name: SCP:TALE OF LIBERTY
description:
SCP : TALE OF LIBERTY , it's a project i started on my own.. it has singleplayer and multiplayer features with photon, 

welp.. it's still on developing so.. don't be so angry when you download it :'c

Update : 

You can start the tutorial at least.

The game is on spanish that's my bad i have to work alone on transcript :'v

welp anyway, you can test out the tutorial, i will work tomorrow on more  weapons  for multiplayer and singleplayer + enemy's
